name: Hardswish
description: Applies the HardSwish activation function element-wise.
formula: HardSwish is defined as: x * ReLU6(x + 3) / 6.

inputs.name: inplace
inputs.description: If True, modifies the input tensor in-place.

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: The input tensor to which the HardSwish function is applied.

outputs.description: A tensor with the HardSwish function applied element-wise.
